Questions.Question: Which Cartoon Network show features a crossover between characters from different series?
Questions.TrueAnswer: The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy
Questions.Explanation: The TV movie 'The Grim Adventures of the KND' features a crossover between 'The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy' and 'Codename: Kids Next Door'.

Questions.Question: In 'The Simpsons', which 1997 episode features a crossover with 'The X-Files'?
Questions.Explanation: In 'The Springfield Files', Mulder and Scully from 'The X-Files' investigate an alien sighting in Springfield.

Questions.Question: Which animated series features a crossover episode between 'Phineas and Ferb' and 'Milo Murphy's Law'?
Questions.Explanation: The episode 'The Phineas and Ferb Effect' is a crossover between 'Phineas and Ferb' and 'Milo Murphy's Law', where the characters team up to confront a time-traveling villain.

Questions.Question: Which cartoon crossover featured the characters from 'SpongeBob SquarePants' and 'The Fairly OddParents'?
Questions.Explanation: In the TV movie 'The Jimmy Timmy Power Hour', Timmy Turner from 'The Fairly OddParents' is accidentally transported into the world of 'The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron' and must find a way back to his own reality.

Questions.Question: In which episode of 'The Flintstones' did they have a crossover with 'The Jetsons'?
Questions.Explanation: In the film 'The Jetsons Meet the Flintstones', the two iconic families meet in a time-traveling adventure.
